website_summaries.verdict: Nice long shotgun case with a lot of storage in the exterior pockets.
pros: Thick padding to protect your firearm
Has an adjustable sling for easy carrying
Foam padding covered in nylon in the interior
cons: Pockets on the outside of this gun bag could be larger
The case only has one zipper instead of two

customer_reviews.title: 48" size fits my vintage Mossberg 185K-A bolt action 20 GA shotgun perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Seems like most questions are whether my gun will fit... so I put it in the title. There is no scope on my shotgun. Well made, side pockets are nice but close fitting so won't fit a lot of accessories in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, seems pretty decent. Feels nice and it’s got about 4 pockets on the sides for accessories/ammo and stuff like that. Bought it for my Gamo swarm magnum .22 air rifle which is around 49-50 in and it’s a perfect fit. Too perfect, it’s a tight fit but it’s not exactly an inconvenience. Would’ve liked a couple inches more for extra space but it’s fine. It’ll probably stretch a bit with use.
customer_reviews.author: Bornin94

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch. Not what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Item received is not like the one on sale. The picture gives the impression of a gun case made of leather. The one I received is a terrible green color made of material that other cases for allot less money are made of. If you want just a cheap shotgun case there are others out there you can buy for allot less that this one.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit a scoped rifle
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT fit a rifle with scope attached like in picture, scope must be taken off and have no where to store it. The pockets are too small and too tight. The material itself is okay, you get what you pay for, but not being able to fit a scoped rifle is what really upsets the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amos C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to have something to take my Chinese SKS to the range in. It fits perfectly, even can carry 6 loaded stripper clips in the front compartments. I also have another Allen case, one designed for fishing tackle, but I removed all the insides, cut a piece of foam to put in it, painted it black, and now use it as a case for my Mossberg Shockwave 590. Again, it's a perfect size for it! So having a couple of these Allen cases, I can say they seem very well made, sturdy stitching, heavy duty material, nothing cheap or flimsy about them!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Y

customer_reviews.title: Good for Ruger American Predator with scope
customer_reviews.text: This case is just what I needed for a Ruger American Predator hunting rifle with a scope. The rifle fits snugly and perfectly inside the case. The material is sturdy and protective with a soft inner liner. There isn't much room for anything besides the rifle. The zipper pouches on the outside might hold a few casings or some small paperwork, but anything bulky needs to be carried in a separate bag or case. It serves my needs for a simple back-and-forth to the range or field.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: MY ADULT SON LOVES THIS CASE FOR HIS PELLET RIFLE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my adult son to go with the pellet rifle that he chose. I was a bit concerned for the low price of it, but was happily surprised at the quality when it arrived here. My son was delighted! It is roomy enough to store all the pellets and the rifle easily and it's very sturdy, too. This is a good purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Behr

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice case with a major flaw
customer_reviews.text: It's a good case for the money and fits my air rifle nicely. It has a loop at the tip to hang the case and rifle but the zipper opens from the bottom so if you open the zipper while it is still hanging the rifle will fall out. Not sure what they were thinking, the zipper should open from the top where the hanging loop is.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Benelli Montefeltro Silver. Right size, multiple pockets for carrying chokes, shells, tools etc. Shoulder strap is convenient for hands free carrying. Interior of the case has adequate space and padding for protection. High build quality. Would buy another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Rossman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this case. I bought it for my beeman silver kodiak. The 4 pockets are nice also. The long pocket is also a perfect fit for the kodiak's 2nd barrel. If it was up to me, this case would come as part of a kodiak gun package. I could not be happier with this purchase. I am now going to replace all of my cases with the ALLEN cases. I would call this an investment. A big THANK YOU to the ALLEN COMPANY. T.R. P.S. I was able to leave scope attached and the case is well stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels durable, just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size case for my TC Impact muzzleloader with scope mounted on it. Plenty of padding, very sturdy feeling zipper, the extra pockets are nice especially for a muzzleloader with the extra bits and pieces. Material seems very durable, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a Winchester 1300 12 Gauge pump with a 28" full chocked ribbed barrel. The gun is 48" total and the case is perfect. I like the idea of the shoulder strap even though I will probably rarely use it but good to have in case.
customer_reviews.author: breeze90265

customer_reviews.title: Case seems fine overall but it arrived new with a hole in ...
customer_reviews.text: Case seems fine overall but it arrived new with a hole in the mesh pocket. Will update if there's a problem with the zipper or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Loose lining material
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this case. The problem is that the lining material is loose fitting and flimsy and the barrel and sight tends to get caught up when sliding the firearm into the case. Very annoying. The outer material is very sturdy, and the various pockets, though somewhat small, are very handy. But because of the lining material I cannot recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Vern S.

customer_reviews.title: Good case, nice (literal) foot print.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent case for the price. That said.....c’mon Amazon fulfillment....at least wipe the big footprint off after you step on it.!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Several different zipper compartments.. the inside is nice soft fabric with foam underneath it. The outside material reminds me of a carhartt coat. Will upload a pic when I get a chance with my pew pew measurements
customer_reviews.author: Cummins08

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my 26 inch Remington 870. It keeps the gun protected just as well as can be asked. The pockets on the side offer just enough storage to keep things like a choke wrench and some gun oil.
customer_reviews.author: K. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Henry Golden Boy. I love it, padded very well, and has a couple of extra pockets for storage. My friends saw it and loved it too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat it for the money but beware of medium or large scopes.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is actually really good quality and the pockets are extremely useful. Some bags at this price point have no pockets, so this is probably one of the best bags for the money. The only thing I don't like about this bag is that there isn't enough room for a medium or larger scope attached. It appears its a common problem with most bags and medium/large scopes will have to be removed before putting it in..
customer_reviews.author: Paul Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Great value -- ridiculous packaging
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag for the money, at least on first inspection. Can't give it 5 stars because the packaging is ABSURD. It's a piece of padded cotton that's maybe 2" thick, but it came in a box big enough to fit an IKEA dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Cormac Foster

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a well built stylish quality material carrying case. I don't trust the zippers though, I guess I'll have to give it time. Definitely value for money
customer_reviews.author: LivinTrini

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken and wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: Came Broken and wrong size. First-timer returning an item. Highly disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhonny

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart at seem upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a better review if not for it coming apart out of the package. Works as desired but it will not last due to seems coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Tvigil

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and it's better than what he was going to buy himself. He likes all the extra pockets and storage it has.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Seems a bit weak
customer_reviews.text: Cheap on the inside, nice look and feel on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: NAB

customer_reviews.title: Will fit (tightly) a 46 inch standard stock (non-AR) rifle with 4-12x40 scope.
customer_reviews.text: Price is right. A little thin for my liking, but is sufficient. Single zipper for opening (would prefer 2 to control access). Side pockets are a little tight for anything except for loose rounds of ammo. Maybe single stack, 5 round magazine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality rifle case for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This rifle case is constructed of quality materials. The zipper (very important) is quality made. A good case will protect your rifle.
customer_reviews.author: musicman

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality rifle case. “Made in USA with domestic and imported components” on the tag. Nice soft case for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Great gun case
customer_reviews.text: This gun case is perfect for my Weatherby long barrel shotgun, plenty of room and good for protection of guns finish.
customer_reviews.author: Dennise Eads

customer_reviews.title: Great Case with Nice features and Smooth Zippers
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Gun casewith some side zippered pockets. Main zipper is smooth and works well. Inside is soft while the outside is thick and seems to be tough material to protect your gun.
customer_reviews.author: Pike

customer_reviews.title: Very good carrier for its value
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I need. It has pockets (albeit not super deep pockets) but still able to hold a few shells. Fits my Youth Remington 870 20ga.
customer_reviews.author: Yee Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality gun case
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality gun case. Excellent padding, and the zippers are all sturdy. Good amount of storage in the pockets for chokes, snap caps, etc. It fits my Beretta 686 with 28 inch barrels with plenty of room left over. Also fits my Remington 1100 (28" barrel) . A very good case for the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made and an Excellent Fit
customer_reviews.text: The price makes this a great bargain. Heavy duty material, smooth-operating zippers, and a solid fit for a standard shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Good for taking to the gun range
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Remington 870 when I take it to the gun range. It's pretty sturdy for a soft case. Wish the pockets were a little bit deeper but good for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 28" barrel Mossberg 500, along with my choke tubes and some other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a scoped Savage A17
customer_reviews.text: I use this case for my Savage A17 with a Bushnell scope mounted on it, and it works great! There's enough room to keep my cleaning rod in the case, and some ammo in the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Like The Case, Not the Storage
customer_reviews.text: The case fits my Winchester SX3 perfectly and I like the 1" padding on both sides of the case. The case LOOKS nice with all those zippers you would think you can store additional chokes, shots, barrels, etc., but all the pockets were very small and not expandable. So great for a shotgun, but don't plan on securing much else in it.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable shotgun bag
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new shotty case. This fit perfectly and has good size storage pockets. Good thick padding compared to some others I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice and well made carring bag
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. I like that the bag is well made. Extra zipper pockets and a soft inner compartment to protect your weapon. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two only received one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for two cases, same size. Package was delivered today with only one case in the box.
customer_reviews.author: David Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Number one considering the price point
customer_reviews.text: Quality well-built gun case made in the good old USA. You can spend more but can you get more for the money?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gun Case
customer_reviews.text: Hope the husband thinks it's as nice as I do; it's his Christmas present. Won't know til then.
customer_reviews.author: g lav

customer_reviews.title: good padding
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Padding is good. Fit perfectly on my Gamo Magnum plus extra space for Ammo
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic gun case for the price. It fits the Montefeltro silver. It isn't anything fancy, and the pockets on the sides are quite small so they won't fit much, but that wasn't a big deal to me. I just need something to protect my gun on a basic level when I am storing it at home and then driving to go hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: NO BIPODS PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: This case will not accommodate a scoped rifle with a bipod due to the thickness of the case. This is not the fault of the case, but of me not reading ALL of the answered questions. This case is as good as everyone claims. Just keep in mind that it is a single zipper case that is too thick to effectively accommodate a scoped rifle with a bipod. I think that this case is worthy of your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: 65gone

customer_reviews.title: Good case with zipper compartment
customer_reviews.text: I like the zipper compartment for storing items needed for the gun
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Good soft case
customer_reviews.text: Solid case. Honestly I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of it. The pockets are not very big but they aren't meant to replace a range bag. They are big enough for a box of ammo, holding the bolt, and some odds and ends. Thick enough to protect your rifle but not overly so. The zippers are fairly stout and the handles are sewn so they wont rip off and drop your rifle. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying a high quality rifle
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rifle case! Will be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henebry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Good quality inside and out
customer_reviews.author: calbow

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My son is in a shotgun club. Needed a new case for his 12 gauge. This one is great. Plenty of pockets for safety glasses, extra chokes, earplugs etc. Looks like Carhartt which works well with anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K Plyler

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect! The outside zippered pockets are perfect for holding ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my new Remington 597 22 WMR with 3x9x40 scope. It fits perfect! The outside zippered pockets are perfect for holding the owners manual, (to avoid frustration with field stripping) and 4 extra magazines. The inside padding is very nice, and the zippers and stitching are well done. I would recommend this case. Haven't had an Allen case yet that I didn't love.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jay

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and rugged case
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with an Allen product. I like the extra pockets built into this case and highly recommend this style for anyone considering this case. Very durable good quality gun case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. It has a significant amount of padding to protect the gun. Materials and construction are high quality. It feels very secure to carry it by the handles and there is a shoulder strap on the other side as well. It is a darker color than it appears on the website, mine is more of a medium brown, which is fine with me. I don't have a scope on my Ruger so I'm not sure how well that would fit but it looks like there is plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Thilges

customer_reviews.title: A really nice gun case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 20 gauge pump. It’s a really nice case and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: very durable material. Liked all the pockets. Use for my 44 mag Rossi lever action rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lothert

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked at other products on here and found them to be a lower quality, made from toxic materials.
customer_reviews.author: William N Brown

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The case is perfect for my Gamo Varmint pellet rifle. Would order again from them.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT WICKES

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag, Fits My Mossberg Silver Reserve II Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Fits my Mossberg Silver Reserve II O/U perfectly. Appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have used Allen gun cases for years the stitching zippers the material are all of high quality these are definitely well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice and packed with features relative to other cases in its price range. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great prodoct but Holy box it came in!
customer_reviews.text: Great gun case. Well made and at a great price. The box it arrived in was probably 3 feet by 5 feet. Huge! Fold the gun case in half and throw it in a smaller box.
customer_reviews.author: HornedOwl

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Case fits my 22 gauge and my scoped 30-06 (not at the same time), plenty of pockets, handle is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jcr

customer_reviews.title: Lacks room for scoped rifle
customer_reviews.text: OK case BUT not for large scopes or high mount scopes. This case is more for a smaller .22 with not too big a scope. My pellet gun won't fit because scope is too big (3 X 9 40mm). Go for the $29 Allen Dakota Gear cases, perfect. The Allen Bonanza has problems, sent it back. HAPPY CASE HUNTING!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rifle tote
customer_reviews.text: This tote ended up being much nicer than I thought. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: J Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great case, low price!
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality case! I am surprised how nice it is for the price, a lot of storage compartments too!
customer_reviews.author: B Dog

customer_reviews.title: Nice for my Savage A22 with scope
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a nice case! Feels nice, thick and well made. Not long enough for my long barrel 223 I use it for my Savage A22 with a scope and a bipod mounted - perfect fit for that. If your rifle is over 46" long look for a different case
customer_reviews.author: J. Schenck

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good stitching, well padded, good pockets and a perfect fit for my Gamo competition .177 air rifle with scope. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goins

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the money. Thick enough to protect the gun,looks good. Extra pockets are handy. Well made and looks like it will hold up. The lining could be a little tougher.
customer_reviews.author: Quachita Hunter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Well made! Works perfect for my 12 gauge.
customer_reviews.author: rcansawgal

customer_reviews.title: Good for shotguns
customer_reviews.text: This will fit long shotguns I have a 12 gauge semi automatic and it’s a long barrel fits with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for my main rifle...love this product
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McManama

customer_reviews.title: Great case, fits 55+ year-old Mossberg 144 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great case, fits 55+ year-old Mossberg 144 perfectly, even with mid profile scope rings, neat storage pockets, hanger loop @ muzzle end and parallel adjustable sling not pictured, only complaint is that inside lining could be a little more durable, has held up so far but am waiting for lining to tear sooner or later...
customer_reviews.author: TonyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking and seems to be well made. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H Fargeorge

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Bought new Limited Edition Henry 22mag. Looked at various cases. All were made in China, except this one. Looks good, does job for protection, pockets for whatever. Room for hand guns too.
customer_reviews.author: Mel R. Frisbie

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 12 gauge Remington 800 shotgun and it for perfectly. The 4 pockets are nice and the zippers work perfectly. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelzsewer

customer_reviews.title: Great case at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rifle case! it's well padded, and the accessories pockets are a bonus. Fits my Ruger PC Carbine like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Haumana

customer_reviews.title: great deal.
customer_reviews.text: i like the color, the size and they extra storage zipper pockets. This is a winner for the money!
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: good case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case with added storage and padding. Has some added stiffness which is a good price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really well made with good materials. Very pleased with the purchase. My 1974 Remington Wingmaster fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Guild

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the money. Wish it was alittle thicker.
customer_reviews.author: brian Dershaw

customer_reviews.title: 52" is perfect for my shot gun!
customer_reviews.text: So nice! thick material , pockets are great! great great case!
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the money
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case when I received it. The pockets are small so don't plan on carrying much in them. I sent it back. I ordered one for a shotgun. I received one for a rifle or I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: UJ Killa

customer_reviews.title: reviews
customer_reviews.text: just fit perfect for my 30" beretta multitarget. light weight.
customer_reviews.author: JIAN GANG WU

customer_reviews.title: Great Long Gun Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is very well made and durable. It has nice 1 1/2" padding so it will protect your unscoped long gun. I use mine for my Browning Gold Hunter 28" barrel (total length = 50") and it is more convenient than bringing along a bulky hard case to and from the range. There are 4 pockets but all are pretty snug when you have the gun in there. I'm able to fit my gloves and some slimmer items but my muffs and glasses do not fit if I have the gun in there. Overall I am satisfied with the quality of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. If I had it longer probably 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is got to be one of the best gun cases for this price
customer_reviews.text: This is got to be one of the best gun cases for this price. It really is a very nice case and is second one I bought!
customer_reviews.author: Astro

customer_reviews.title: good gun case
customer_reviews.text: good quality canvas type case, nicely padded. Us it regularly 2-3 days a week carrying my gun back and forth to trap range and for storage in the closet. outside pockets are nice for wipe down rags. bore snake, chokes, etc. Has held up well I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ncman424

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, looks good, protects the product and it has both zipper pockets to keep stuff in and a shoulder sling to carry it with.
customer_reviews.author: ZCV

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, bigger than described.
customer_reviews.text: Case delivered to me has 48" exterior length, not 46". Probably would fit guns up to 46". Interior material is soft and prevents my 43" air rifle from slipping around inside in spite of the extra length. Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: OK Gun Case, Not real well padded.
customer_reviews.text: Not as well padded as I like for scoped rifles, but overall it does an adequate job of protecting my rifle.
customer_reviews.author: JOC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Allen gun cases are great quality and functionality for the price. I will buy their product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence O.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I keep a Savage 93R17 in this case with a Boyds thumbhole stock with a large scope. I put a bipod in the first pocket, extra ammo in the middle pockets, and magazines in the last pocked. I keep the case in my truck and have everything I need in one back for varmint shooting. Great quality and build. Nice padding too.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mossberg 930. Super high quality on all of the stitching/zippers/etc. Looks great, very thick padding and long enough to fit most long shotguns and rifles. There are lots of little pockets all over it too, actually a bit much but nice to have them there, they don't hurt anything.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags for the money- hold my shotguns securely. Good quality materials and sturdy stitching.
customer_reviews.author: richie rich

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 17 HMR with a scope for my boyfriend and decided to get this case for it. I absolutely LOVE it. the 17 fits in the case PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my scoped 42" rifle and it fits perfect. It has plenty of pockets to store various things. The padding is thick and the material used on the inside will not snag on sharp objects. There is a shoulder strap that is not seen in the picture that is quite handy. The handles Velcro together and have plenty of padding. The overall construction is great. I highly recommend this case. I don't think it will fit anything longer than a 42" rifle. Shipping to California was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not your average case
customer_reviews.text: Fits a scoped pellet rifle perfectly (42.5" rifle) and has lots of nice zippered pockets for pellet tins and such. Also has an adjustable sling built on the back of the case. Has good padding, very happy with it at it's low price.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Material and Construction
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my 42 inch Marlin 35 rifle with scope. Good quality in materials and workmanship. Fits the rifle snuggly and provides good protection. Does not have much storage capability as the pockets are small, but it works well carrying the rifle to/from the range.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: A Ruger American 30-06 with Redfield scope fit perfectly. I was able to fit a box of ammo in the back pocket and a full cleaning kit in the front pocket. The carry strap came in handy when moving from site to site.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 its exactly what it looks like. It fits my rem 700 adl with a ...
customer_reviews.text: 5/5 its exactly what it looks like. It fits my rem 700 adl with a bipod and scope thats on high rings. The padding is nice and the extra pouches are great for an extra box of ammo or range tools.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McDermott

product_meta.title: Allen Company Daytona Soft Carrying Shotgun and Rifle Case
feature_bullets: Four accessory pockets store cleaning supplies, targets, hearing and eye protection, etc.
